name: Kung fu Hives
description:
THE GAME IS NOT COMPLETE YET! BUT ITS BETTER THEN V1!

Looks like you hit a bee's hive causing the destruction of the whole world, but can you stop the bees before they destroy everything?

How to play: 

Use the mouse to aim and left mouse to shoot at the enemies. Stop the bees from landed or they start shooting and don't like those green dudes get to close or they attack you! good luck :)

Credits:

Programmed by: Blockhead Manic

Music and sound by: Buyana114

Art by: Soninho Dev
